spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is correct. Door swings are inconsistent compared to the plan (E3). Window placement in the living area and kitchen is simplified.

structural_fidelity.notes: All primary rooms are accounted for. The utility area and general kitchen partition show minor simplified geometry compared to the technical ducting shown in the 2D plan (E4).

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement logically follows the 2D layout, though bed and sofa proportions are slightly scaled for visualization.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality orthographic/isometric camera placement. Soft, diffuse lighting with clean geometry and a cohesive material palette.

detected_errors.description: Internal door swing directions in bedrooms and bathrooms differ from the architectural 2D plan.
The kitchen and utility partitions are slightly thicker/simplified, losing the precision of the utility wall in the 2D source.
Slight clipping in the rendering of the secondary balcony railing geometry.
